issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Document supported features
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11181](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11181). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Document supported Parquet features in the Rust implementation, similar to ARROW-10941
